data.title: Bitcoin steadies as Iran denies Khamenei death reports
data.description:
Bitcoin steadies as markets assess U. S. -Israeli strikes on Iran and conflicting claims; Iran denies Khamenei death. Focus on macro risk and succession.
source: https://coincu.com/news/bitcoin-steadies-as-iran-denies-khamenei-death-reports/

data.title: Michael Saylor: STRC's deferred dividend yield will be increased to 11.50% in March 2026.
data.description: Michael Saylor posted on social media that the STRC deferred dividend yield, which expires in March 2026, has been increased by 25 basis points to 11.50%.

data.title: Lily Liu responded to controversial remarks, seemingly implying that she "doesn't speculate on cryptocurrencies, she only focuses on infrastructure development."
data.description: Solana Foundation President Lily Liu posted a screenshot on Twitter of her controversial previous statement about "not wasting time on cryptocurrencies," along with the caption, "I don't eat pasta, but I love making it." The community speculates that Liu's response suggests she's not involved in cryptocurrency trading, but rather focused on infrastructure development. Previously, Liu had jokingly echoed OpenClaw founder Peter Steinberger's statement about "not wasting time on cryptocurrencies," which drew strong criticism from the community.

data.title: Australian Prime Minister Reaffirms Stance Against Iranian Regime
data.description: Australian Prime Minister Anthony Albanese has reiterated the country's firm opposition to the Iranian regime. According to Jin10, Albanese emphasized Australia's clear stance against what he described as the 'brutal' Iranian government. This statement underscores Australia's ongoing diplomatic position and aligns with its broader foreign policy objectives. The Prime Minister's remarks come amid heightened international scrutiny of Iran's domestic and foreign policies.

data.title: GEOPOLITICS | Cuba Calls for End to U.S. and Israeli Aggression Against Iran
data.description: Cuba's Ministry of Foreign Affairs has issued a statement urging the cessation of recent aggressive actions by the United States and Israel towards Iran. According to Jin10, the Cuban government expressed its concern over the escalating tensions and called for diplomatic solutions to resolve the conflict. The statement highlights the importance of maintaining peace and stability in the region, emphasizing the need for dialogue and negotiation. Cuba's position reflects its longstanding opposition to foreign intervention and its support for sovereignty and self-determination.

data.title: Iran's crypto ecosystem is projected to reach $7.78 billion by 2025, with the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps controlling over 50% of the funds.
data.description: Chainalysis data shows that Iran's crypto ecosystem reached $7.78 billion in 2025, with addresses associated with the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC) accounting for over 50% of the crypto fund inflows, receiving over $3 billion throughout the year. Elliptic points out that the Central Bank of Iran received at least $507 million in USDT in 2025 for stabilizing the rial and trade settlements. The Iranian government's Bitcoin mining cost is approximately $1,300 per coin, which is sold at market price. Recent US-Israeli military strikes against Iran may disrupt the power grid, thereby affecting energy-intensive mining activities. (CoinDesk)

data.title: France's February New Car Registrations Drop 14.7% Amid Tesla's Surge
data.description: New car registrations in France fell by 14.7% in February, totaling 120,764 vehicles. According to Jin10, this decline contrasts with the performance of Tesla, which saw its registrations increase by 55.11% during the same period. The overall decrease in new car registrations highlights challenges in the automotive market, while Tesla's growth indicates a rising interest in electric vehicles.

data.title: Aave Will Win's proposal Temp Check has been approved.
data.description: Aave founder Stani Kulechov announced on the X platform that the Aave Will Win proposal's Temp Check has been approved, which will drive Aave Labs' transformation to a fully token-centric model, allocating 100% of product revenue to AAVE tokens. The next step will be to optimize the structure based on community feedback and enter the ARFC phase.

data.title: Ripple Unlocks 200 Million XRP Tokens from Escrow
data.description: Ripple has released 200 million XRP tokens from its escrow account, as reported by Whale Alert. According to NS3.AI, this release is part of Ripple's strategic escrow mechanism designed to manage the supply of XRP. Large movements of tokens like this often draw investor attention and have the potential to impact market liquidity and pricing.

data.title: Arbitrum Token Faces Pressure as Whale Selling Intensifies
data.description: Arbitrum's native token, ARB, is facing continued pressure, approaching its all-time low despite broader market recoveries. According to NS3.AI, significant selling activity by large holders, who have offloaded over 60 million ARB tokens in the past three weeks, is impacting price momentum. The token's key support levels are under threat, indicating potential further declines unless investor sentiment shifts decisively.

data.title: GEOPOLITICS | IAEA to Hold Special Meeting on Iran Issue
data.description: The International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) Board of Governors is scheduled to convene a special meeting regarding the Iran issue on the morning of March 2, local time. According to Jin10, this meeting comes amid ongoing concerns about Iran's nuclear activities and international diplomatic efforts to address them. The IAEA plays a crucial role in monitoring nuclear compliance and facilitating dialogue among member states. The outcome of this meeting could have significant implications for regional stability and international relations.

data.title: Bitcoin’s Perpetual Markets Are Quietly Resetting And That May Be Exactly What the Market Needs
data.description:
On-chain and derivatives data is showing a steady compression in Bitcoin’s perpetual market directional premium, a signal that speculative long exposure is unwinding gradually rather than through the kind of violent liquidation cascade that typically marks a panic bottom, with analysts framing the current sideways price action as a constructive leverage detox rather than structural deterioration. What the Data Is Showing Perpetual market directional premium measures the degree to which traders are paying a premium to hold leveraged long positions. When that premium is elevated, it indicates crowded long positioning and a market that is leaning heavily in one direction. When it compresses, the long bias is fading, funding rates are normalizing, and open interest is cooling as speculative capital exits its positions
source: https://www.ethnews.com/bitcoins-perpetual-markets-are-quietly-resetting-and-that-may-be-exactly-what-the-market-needs/

data.title: A whale spent $4 million to buy 145,700 HYPE tokens, and made a profit of over $500,000.
data.description: According to Onchain Lens monitoring, in the past 24 hours, a whale, 0x96d, spent $4 million USDC to buy 145,741 HYPE tokens at a price of $27.45, and currently has a floating profit of over $500,000.

data.title: The United States has no intention of releasing oil from its strategic reserves.
data.description: The United States is not considering releasing oil from its strategic petroleum reserves, indicating that Washington believes oil price increases following an Iranian attack will be limited. A U.S. Department of Energy official stated that there has been no discussion whatsoever regarding strategic petroleum reserves. The media report states that the U.S. currently holds approximately 415 million barrels of oil in its strategic reserves for unforeseen circumstances. The market widely expects a new round of Middle East conflict to disrupt energy supplies, and oil prices to rise after the New York market opens. Meanwhile, Iranian media reports that the Strait of Hormuz, a crucial oil shipping route, is effectively closed. (Jinshi)

data.title: The daughter and grandson of Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Khamenei were killed in a US-Israeli airstrike.
data.description: Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Khamenei's daughter and grandson were killed in US-Israeli airstrikes. (Jinshi)

data.title: Iran says Pezeshkian survived amid US-Israel strikes
data.description:
Masoud Pezeshkian assassination attempt, Israel Iran strikes 2026, international reaction Russia E3 UN: Tehran and family say he survived; UN/E3 reaction noted
source: https://coincu.com/news/iran-says-pezeshkian-survived-amid-us-israel-strikes/

data.title: PRECIOUS METALS | Thailand to Enforce New Gold Trading Regulations to Curb Speculation
data.description: Thailand is set to introduce stringent regulations on retail gold trading starting March 1. Bloomberg posted on X, the move aims to reduce speculative activities that have contributed to the strengthening of the baht, impacting the country's competitive edge. The new rules are part of broader efforts to stabilize the currency and enhance economic stability. Authorities hope that by curbing speculative trading, they can mitigate the adverse effects on the nation's economy and improve its global competitiveness.

data.title: China's Political Meeting to Address Tech and Economic Strategies
data.description: China is set to begin its most significant annual political meeting next week. Bloomberg posted on X, highlighting that investors are keen to understand Beijing's plans for advancing its technology goals while also revitalizing a delicate consumer economy. The meeting is expected to provide insights into the government's strategies for balancing technological development with economic growth.

data.title: Hyperliquid Strategies remains $356M in gains as losses drag down DAT firms
data.description:
Amid the flood of negative sentiments hitting the crypto markets from every side and affecting different sectors, Hyperliquid Strategies continues to stay afloat, beating other companies like Bitmine and Strategy in terms of profitability. According to data from analytics firm Artemis, Hyperliquid Strategies has emerged as the leading digital asset treasury firm in terms of […]
source: https://www.cryptopolitan.com/hyperliquid-strategies-gain-losses-dat-firms/

data.title: Iran's Retaliatory Strikes Test Missile Defense Stocks
data.description: The capacity of the United States, Israel, and Gulf Arab states to withstand potential retaliatory strikes from Iran hinges on their missile interceptor reserves. Bloomberg posted on X, highlighting concerns that these stocks are likely depleted. The situation underscores the strategic importance of maintaining adequate defense resources in the face of escalating tensions in the region. As geopolitical dynamics evolve, the ability to replenish and manage these critical defense assets remains a priority for these nations.
